name: Wrath of Shape Master
description:
Wrath of Shape Master is a single arena game. Fight with spawned waves of the enemies and stay alive till last battle.

The game was created in a single week and submitted to Weekly Game Jam 140 which topic was Shapeshift.

I am planning to add few more features after the game jame so stay tuned!

Manual:

WSAD - player movement

Q - switch shape of the weapon

M - mute the music

Boss fight: shoot spawned shapes to make boss vurnable and avoid his projectiles.

Credits:

Author: Adam Malewsk (OOOH Man Studios)

Assets used:

  • Scut Pixel Tileset
  • Fantasy RPG Characters
  • Animated Slimes
  • Sorcerer
  • UI Buttons
